metadata.name: Belem Gardens
metadata.description:
This work has more the 10 Awards on Photo Contests.

The photo was taken in Belém, a noble area of Lisbon giving onto the River Tagus and gardens as neighbours ... a "World of Culture" surrounds you.

It was in the middle of the day, in the weekend. There’s nothing more refreshing for city-dwellers than a day out in contact with nature. It feels great to leave the noise of cars behind and forget the hectic pace of daily routine. To have a picnic on the grass and hear birds chirping, to take some photos, to read a book in the shade of a tree or wander aimlessly – these small pleasures add to our wellness.

The idea was also to share the beautiful light we have in Lisbon. Steeped in history and culture, this enchanting ‘city of light’ boasts a natural luminosity and effortless charm unlike any other in the country and has become a popular European destination for its exciting diversity, beautiful sites and enviable, sunny climate.
